text: @HillaryClinton Mere speculation, but nearly half of the accounts tweeting about the coronavirus pandemic are likely bots, Carnegie Mellon researchers say, adding that the tweets appeared aimed at sowing divisions in America. If the shoe fits, “@HillaryClinton” ...
